f2d09d1b-27e6-4250-bebf-a98bca5fff1e.name: host_name
f2d09d1b-27e6-4250-bebf-a98bca5fff1e.queryValue:
SELECT
    JSONExtractString(labels, 'host_name') AS host_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'pgbouncer_config_max_client_connections'
GROUP BY host_name, metric_name
ORDER BY metric_name DESC
LIMIT 10;
